page.title: 03Home Life In Dymchurch
page.content: There are 4 people in the Sturdy family:my mum,Pam,my dad,Graham,my brother,Craig,age 9 & me,Zoe.My dad is a senior agent (building) and my mum is a teacher.I would like to be an actress.I have 2 grandmas & I grand- dad, the other died of a heart attack. We have 2 cars, a Ford Sierra & a Ford Escort.Our dog,Sam,is a Yorkshire terrier.We have a very fast tortoise called Terry.We live at 11 Kingsway, Dymchurch.My favourite movie is "Pol- ice Academy."A great T.V.programme is "Fame."My hobbies are swimming & looking at weird fashion hair styles.I go to Hythe Swimming Club & in my spare time I enjoy water fights.My best friend is Danielle.My favourite meal is chicken & chips with banana split for pudding.I enjoy cycling to school & playing rounders at playtime.
